en.today: You may feel torn between platonic and romantic connections, dear Aries, as the sun aspects Neptune, Uranus, and Pluto throughout the day. Confide in friends who are fair and honest, and acknowledge if you've been elusive in matters of the heart recently. Whenever possible, try to get that special someone and your band of comrades on the same team. The Libra moon will be rooting for Love, though it would be easy to get carried away with your emotions while Jupiter is activated. Recognize if your needs have been swept to the side this evening when Luna opposes Chiron.

en.today: You'll be in dreamy spirits as the Sun aligns with Neptune, Uranus, and Pluto throughout the day, warm lion. en.today: Put in the hard work necessary to fuel your wildest dreams, dear Taurus, as the sun aspects Neptune, Uranus, and Pluto throughout the day. Don't let a fear of the unknown cause you to hold back, but get ready to improvise when your plans don't pan out exactly how you'd imagined. Just be mindful of your physical and mental needs while Jupiter activates this morning and Chiron stirs this evening.

en.today: You'll feel inspired to go your own way, dear Gemini, as the sun aspects Neptune, Uranus, and Pluto throughout the day. These vibes are perfect for refreshing your image, presenting creative projects, and taking leaps of faith. Try not to let the opinions of peers dissuade you from going out on a limb, and steer clear of anyone who might plant seeds of doubt. Luckily, the Libra moon works overtime to bolster your confidence, helping you find courage with each bold move made. Continue carving out grand paths you've set out upon while Jupiter and Chiron activate, and avoid comparing your journey to someone else's.
